name: Lynette
title: Elegance in the Shadows
description: A magic assistant of few words, her emotions are as inscrutable as any cat's.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.

plunging.1: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

description.0: Flicks her mantle and executes an Enigma Thrust, dealing <anemo>Anemo DMG</anemo>.
description.1: When the Enigma Thrust hits an opponent, it will restore Lynette's HP based on her Max HP, and in the 4s afterward, she will lose a certain amount of HP per second.
description.2: Based on whether you press or hold this ability, she will use Enigma Thrust differently.
description.5: She swiftly uses an Enigma Thrust.
description.8: Lynette will enter a high-speed Pilfering Shadow state and apply Shadowsign to a nearby opponent. You can control her movement direction during this state, and you can end it prematurely by using this skill again.
description.9: When this high-speed state ends, Lynette will unleash her Enigma Thrust. If there is an opponent with Shadowsign applied to them nearby, Lynette will approach them in a flash before using Enigma Thrust.
description.11: A maximum of 1 opponent can have Shadowsign at any one time. When this opponent gets too far from Lynette, the Shadowsign will be canceled.
description.14: At specific intervals, Lynette will unleash a Surging Blade when she uses Enigma Thrust, dealing Ousia-aligned <anemo>Anemo DMG</anemo>.
description.16: "Now then, turn your eyes to the stage and continue to enjoy the performance. When I next appear, I'll be where you least expect."

description.0: Lynette raises her mantle high, dealing <anemo>AoE Anemo DMG</anemo>, using skillful sleight of hand to make a giant Bogglecat Box appear!
3: Taunts nearby opponents, attracting their attacks.
Deals <anemo>Anemo DMG</anemo> to nearby opponents at intervals.

When the Bogglecat Box comes into contact with <hydro>Hydro</hydro>/<pyro>Pyro</pyro>/<cryo>Cryo</cryo>/<electro>Electro</electro>, it will gain the corresponding element and additionally fire Vivid Shots that will deal DMG from that element at intervals.
description.4: Elemental Absorption of this kind will only occur once during this ability's duration.
description.6: "Look this way, and look closely. This is a time for miracles, just for us."

description.0: Within 10s after using Magic Trick: Astonishing Shift, when there are 1/2/3/4 Elemental Types in the party, all party members' ATK will be increased by 8%/12%/16%/20% respectively.

After the Bogglecat Box summoned by Magic Trick: Astonishing Shift performs Elemental Conversion, Lynette's Elemental Burst will deal 15% more DMG. This effect will persist until the Bogglecat Box's duration ends.
Shows the location of nearby Recovery Orbs on the minimap. The Aquatic Stamina and HP gained from touching Orbs will be increased by 25%.

constellation1.name: A Cold Blade Like a Shadow

description.0: When Enigmatic Feint's Enigma Thrust hits an opponent with Shadowsign, a vortex will be created at that opponent's position that will pull nearby opponents in.
Whenever the Bogglecat Box summoned by Magic Trick: Astonishing Shift fires a Vivid Shot, it will fire an extra Vivid Shot.
Increases the Level of Magic Trick: Astonishing Shift by 3.
Increases the Level of Enigmatic Feint by 3.
When Lynette uses Enigmatic Feint's Enigma Thrust, she will gain an Anemo Infusion and 20% Anemo DMG Bonus for 6s.
